message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000.
Alice,  $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go as high as $12,000.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. What do you think?
Alice, I really appreciate you being willing to compromise. However, $16,000 is still a bit more than I can comfortably spend. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14,000. I'm willing to meet you at $17,000, which is still a good compromise. What do you think?
